item.title: Switching from iTerm to Hyper Terminal
item.author: kunal.sumbly@gmail.com (Kunal Sumbly)
item.description: Recently zeit.co released to the world a wonderful terminal built with JavaScript / HTML / CSS called Hyper. Even better yet, this terminal is fully customizable with open source plugins. I’m not one to change my development environment constantly, but this electron app was simple to install on OSX and even easier to customize programmatically. My hope is to demo how simple it is to get started with Hyper terminal, and show how I only added a few lines to the configuration file to have a terminal I enjoy to use.
